thread.title: Ammunition, explosive boxes found in Red Fort wells
thread.title_full: Ammunition, explosive boxes found in Red Fort wells

title: Ammunition, explosive boxes found in Red Fort wells
text:
Ammunition, explosive boxes found in Red Fort wells Ammunition, explosive boxes found in Red Fort wells The discovery triggered panic, prompting police to cordone off the area and inform the NSG. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Updated: February 6, 2017 12:44 pm Bomb disposal teams from the NSG as well as the Delhi Police bomb and dog squads reached the spot. (File Photo) 
Ammunition and explosive boxes have been found during cleaning of wells inside Red Fort, ANI reported Monday. The discovery triggered panic, prompting police to cordon off the area and inform the NSG. 
Bomb disposal teams from the NSG as well as the Delhi Police and dog squads are at the spot. Fire tenders, too, have also rushed in. 
More details awaited.
